pr_title: Remove 'core' prefix for main related integration tests modules

timeline.message: Remove core-impl integration test as we cover camel-cloud test through consul extension

timeline.bodyText: Does it make sense to have a separate core test category with a single test module?
timeline.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText: I will revisit it after the work on the bootstrap as there could be some new tests belonging to the core category. this is primary aimed to have a clear baseline for the upcoming work
replies.author: lburgazzoli
